articles.description: Digital banking startup Revolut is launching travel eSIM plans in the U.K. that give users access to data abroad without suffering roaming charges.
articles.content:
Revolut is launching a travel eSIM plan in the U.K., in a rare move for a financial services firm.

articles.title: Tod's Group to Go Private in Deal with L Catterton - The Business of Fashion
articles.description: Ties run deep between the Della Valle family that controls Tod’s and L Catterton backer LVMH. The delisting could allow Tod’s to invest heavily in promoting its brands while cleaning up distribution away from the scrutiny of public markets.
